'''Grant''' was part of the group from Pegasus that was touring the hospital with [[Alana Cahill]].

==History==
While touring [[Seattle Grace Mercy West Hospital]], Grant, along with the rest of the group, was taken on a detour with [[Derek Shepherd]], who was trying to keep them out of the ER, where they were treating a patient despite the ER being closed. ''("[[The Face of Change]]")''

Grant was also present when the deal was about to made official, though [[Owen Hunt]] interrupted the meeting and convinced [[Alana Cahill]] to pull out in favor of the doctors planning to buy the hospital. ''("[[Hard Bargain]]")''

==Career==
Grant works for Pegasus Horizons.
